THF

Mar 12, 2023 • Lin Xiaowei

3D visualisation

The overall structure of the THF I riboswitch was generated from PDB ID:4LVV at 2.10 Å resolution bound with 6S-folinic acid.6S-folinic acid (shown in sticks) is labeled in red.【4】 <td style="text-align:center" border:0> </td>
